title: Are Turks simply Turkish-speaking Muslim Greeks? - Quora

response.answer_text: No Turks have their own genetic cluster.Modern day Turks of Anatolia is mix of Turkmens and pre Turkic people of anatolia aka Anatolian Greeks.Modern day Turks of Anatolia genetically close to Azerbaijanis Karachay-Balkars etc.Generally Turkic peoples are eurasian but Turkic people who mix with caucasians ended up looking like caucasian and Turkic people who mix with asian people endep up looking like asian.East eurasia or mongoloid is not equal to Turkic because even early Turks we can know were already eurasian but east eurasia can give you idea.

There are two versions of this : Greeks Greek speaking Christian Turks or Turks Turkish speaking Muslim Greeks ,as you have also mentioned . As Turks and Greeks are the nations that have been mingled for so long , it is inevitable to have quite a lot of things in common . And I always announce that Greece feels like home whenever I visit .

Yes certainly. Turks are cyrpto greeks who troll EU by behaving hostile, converting churchs to mousques by building minarets, make up funny words and give it them to foods, baklava, kebap, sarma, cacık etc… The best trolling ever…
